alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 3:38AM PDT until April 19 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades. Cascades in Lane County near McKenzie Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy winds with falling snow may reduce visibility at times. Because precipitation is showery, there will likely be variations in snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
